message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY

This paper discusses a novel covert channel using optical mice, which can be used to access sensitive systems. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the effects of infrared, distance, and brightness on mouse input, which relates to human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The transmission rate and the use of LED as a transmitter involve information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the susceptibility of infrared mice to similar attacks, which relates to network infrastructure (cs.NI) and system security (cs.SY).
